GPS disabled Settings Exit To use this application you must enable GPS in system settings
Please enter a PASS-PHRASE Remember : This will be the code to send from the SENDING PHONE location
Check protected list. To use this application you must check that it can operate in sleep mode.
Enable accessibility service. To work properly on devices from some manufacturer Application must be registered as accessibility service. If you have device from on of such brand, or app didn\'t work after reboot, you must enable Simple SMS Locator accessibility service. To services Skip
On some devices form Huawei, OnePlus, Mi and etc OS prevent apps from starting up their services automatically on boot complete. To avoid it bug we need registered and enable accessibility service. \n Full explanation of this trick can be found here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41524459/broadcast-receiver-not-working-after-device-reboot-in-android/41627296
